entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Sept-Îles
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:54 p.m. EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 2.2°C
